name: Daze N Willow
description:
Daze N Willow - Created for the 5. HedgeJam.

I see you are one of these spoiled people. Infinite food, oxygen, space to live and light. but you do not value these things in any way. 

So tell me how it would be for you if you had only one of each.

How it would feel if I stuck you in a lonely, cramped dungeon.

What would that feel like? Well, let's simply . . . find . . . it out . . .

In Daze N Willow you'll take control of a small candle that is looking for its lost, once eternal goods. Can you reclaim them and escape the endless yawn?

The game was made for the 5th HedgeJam and such in 2 weeks. I (Nosioce) did all the 3D models, music and scripts. The game was developed in Unreal5, the music was composed in Ableton live 11 and the models were made in Blender 3.4. I recorded every step and will post the devlog sometime later, I just need to edit the hours of footage into a short video.

this is my very first gamejam, so let me know if i have made any blunders.

15.04 - (Updated to version a1.1 - Performance improvements and visual fixes)

16.04 - (Updated to version a1.2 - Added a graphics settings menu)
